tables.name: qsr_blocks
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive summary of block data from the Cosmos ecosystem, including height, timestamp, and related information. It provides valuable insights for analyzing the performance and security of the blockchain network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The cumulative number of blocks in the blockchain at the time of data ingestion.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network being referenced.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block for validation.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators present in the block.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total size of the messages in the block in bytes.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions in the block.

tables.name: qsr_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides information on QSR events across various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the activities and attributes of these events. By analyzing this data, users can gain a deeper understanding of the QSR network and its dynamics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the event took place.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The ID of the transaction in which the event was recorded.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The source of the event, typically a specific module or contract.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the event data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the event was created.

tables.name: qsr_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides detailed information about message event attributes from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers insights into the transactions and their impact on the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: qsr_transactions
tables.description: Details of transactions in the QSR network, including block height, chain ID, and transaction information.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Message generated by the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Memo or note associated with the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Transaction fee.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Code or status of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Amount of gas used by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Amount of gas requested by the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was ingested.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the schema used for the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Coins used for the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account that granted the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum amount of gas allowed for the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Mode used for single- signature transactions.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data for multi-signature transactions.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Height of the block after which the transaction will timeout.

tables.name: qsr_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains transaction messages from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the transactions and their associated metadata.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain where the transaction was committed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain where the transaction was executed.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message sent as part of the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message sent as part of the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to validate the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block where the transaction was committed.
